attributes.action: To introduce a Statuary Law Offence Compensation Order or to use an acronym S.L.O.C.O
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lack of respect and responsibility.We have to continually put up with offences against society such as loutish behaviour,car crime,drunken disorder, attacks on the fire service,abuse of hospital staff etc etc and to that end I propose the following petition. It has come to the point in time when there has to be a personable responsibility associated with any statuary law offence when a part of societies justice must demand at a minimum that the perpetrator has to make recompense for at least part of the costs involved in attention that involves any one or more of the police, fire or hospital services.That recompense could take the form of satisfying some degree of the financial costs of any or all all of the services involved, if unable to pay then compulsory public community work equal in value. In satisfying either option this then could be balanced against any further legal judgement required. Failure to comply would require a government consideration and solution. I sincerely believe that we need to bring back respect and responsibility and my suggestion of a S.L.O.C.O ( pronounced like BLOC O ) would hopefully be a contributing factor to that end. PLEASE SUPPORT MY PETITION
